text:
Just a note, a lot of the slowdown in Julia's DataFrames will be fixed with a few things that are in the pipeline:

Faster `groupby`:
     <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFrames.jl/pull/2610>
     <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFrames.jl/pull/2592> (maybe not as relevant)

Multithreading
    <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFrames.jl/pull/2588>
    <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFrames.jl/pull/2491>
    <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFrames.jl/pull/2647>

The multi-threading ones will be the most relevant with those 50GB tests, when the cost of new threads is negligible compared to the rest of the operation.

elements.text:
Just a note, a lot of the slowdown in Julia's DataFrames will be fixed with a few things that are in the pipeline:

Faster
The multi-threading ones will be the most relevant with those 50GB tests, when the cost of new threads is negligible compared to the rest of the operation.
